data.message: Hey Marshall not sure if I spelled that right but hey you probably will never see it anyway but that's okay grew up in the D area inkster/ Westland in the 90's I'm 36 now not sure if we ever crossed paths. Just wanted to say hi and glad you made it! As did I not as well as you of course but I'm alive and made through the Streets in the 90s all while being white!

replies.message: I just got done watching a old cnn interview with you. It made me think I should at least say hi being crammed in lockers and left not knowing when I'm gonna get out junior high was a bitch! Love the science behind what you do.
